Reviews.Title: “Good Value”

Reviews.Content: please understand luxury experience 5 star hotel hotel 2 star offer clean value location diera crowded noisy getting taxi 2 day stay sites shopping restaurants easy walking distance hotel breakfast buffet extra 25 aed 7 person average service throughout hotel slow little disorganized bill accurate real reason stay low cost refreshing dubais expensive hotel market

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for the price”
Reviews.Author: Steve4p
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights dream palace january 2010 stayed smallish 7th top floor fine sleep air con excellent recently renovated clean linen smallish tv 3 4 english channels including cnn staff friendly stay excellent rate 68 night including taxes metro al station 10 minute walk hotel booked expedia
